system:
note description: "[ Container that holds only one widget. ]" appearance: "[ --------------- | | | item | | | --------------- ]" legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "container" date: "$Date: 2013-05-20 16:15:17 -0700 (Mon, 20 May 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 92557 $"
class ../interface/ev_cell.xmlEV_CELL
inherit ../interface/ev_container.xmlEV_CONTAINER redefine ../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_implementationimplementation end
../interface/ev_dockable_target.xmlEV_DOCKABLE_TARGET undefine ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state redefine ../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_implementationimplementation end
create ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create
feature -- Access
f_has../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_hashas (v: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET): FalseBOOLEAN -- Does Current include v? do Result := not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed and (v /= Void and then ../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_itemitem = v) end
feature -- Status report
f_is_empty../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_is_emptyis_empty: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is there no element? -- Was declared in ../interface/ev_cell.xmlEV_CELL as synonym of ../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_extendibleextendible. do Result := not ../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_fullfull end
f_extendible../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_extendibleextendible: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is there no element? -- Was declared in ../interface/ev_cell.xmlEV_CELL as synonym of ../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_is_emptyis_empty. do Result := not ../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_fullfull end
f_full../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_fullfull: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is structure filled to capacity? do Result := ../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_itemitem /= Void and not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed end
f_prunable../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_prunableprunable: FalseBOOLEAN -- May items be removed? do Result := not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed end
f_writable../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_writablewritable: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is there a current item that may be modified? do Result := not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed end
f_readable../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_readablereadable: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is there a current item that may be accessed? do Result := ../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_fullfull and not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed end
f_count../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_countcount: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Number of items in Current. do Result := ../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_countcount ensure then valid_result: Result = 0 or Result = 1 end
feature -- Removal
f_prune../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_pruneprune (v: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET) -- Remove v if contained. do if ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_itemitem = v then ../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_wipe_outwipe_out end ensure then not ../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_hashas (v) end
f_wipe_out../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_wipe_outwipe_out -- Remove ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_itemitem. do ../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_replacereplace (Void) end
feature -- Conversion
f_linear_representation../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_linear_representationlinear_representation: FalseLINEAR [like ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_itemitem] -- Representation as a linear structure local l: FalseLINKED_LIST [like ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_itemitem] do create l.Falsemake if ../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_readablereadable then l.Falseextend (../interface/ev_container.xml#f_itemitem) end Result := l end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I, ../implementation_interface/ev_shared_transport_i.xmlEV_SHARED_TRANSPORT_I} -- Implementation
f_implementation../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_implementationimplementation: ../implementation_interface/ev_cell_i.xmlEV_CELL_I -- Responsible for interaction with native graphics toolkit.
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_create_implementation../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_create_implementationcreate_implementation -- Create implementation of Current. do create {../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xmlEV_CELL_IMP} ../interface/ev_cell.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_makemake end

end -- class ../interface/ev_cell.xmlEV_CELL
